A divine discovery of sincerity according to its proper and peculiar nature: very profitable for all sorts of persons to peruse. First preached, and now published, for the good of Gods Church in generall. By Nicholas Lockyer Master of Arts. Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.
[16], 229, [1] p.
Printed by E. G[riffin] for Iohn Rothwell, at the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1640.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
